attributes.action: Stop discriminating against Humanists by recognising Humanist wedding ceremonies as Legal, as in Scotland
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Humanist Wedding ceremonies are recognised in Scotland as Legal marriages, however in England a couple must also undergo a civil ceremony. This is discriminatory against people who are non religious, as religious weddings are legally recognised and couples do not have to also have a civil ceremony.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
